code_of_conduct: Respect the tranquility of the forest and fellow participants.
Refrain from disruptive behavior during meditation sessions.
Leave no trace: Dispose of waste responsibly.
Follow instructions from the meditation guide for a safe and enjoyable experience.
Refrain from using electronic devices during sessions.
description: Unwind and reconnect with nature in our forest bathing meditation session. Experience the healing power of the forest and rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.
title: Forest Bathing Meditation

code_of_conduct: Stay on designated paths and respect trail markers.
Respect the knowledge and expertise of the guide.
Dispose of waste responsibly and keep the area clean.
Respect the natural habitat of wildlife and avoid disturbing them.
Follow safety instructions provided by the guide.
description: Join us for a leisurely walk through fields of colorful wildflowers. Learn about local flora and enjoy the beauty of nature in bloom.
title: Wildflower Walk

code_of_conduct: Respect the environment and avoid causing damage while taking photographs.
Be respectful of other participants and their space while photographing.
Do not disturb wildlife while capturing images.
Follow safety instructions provided by workshop leaders.
Respect the privacy and consent of individuals who may be subjects of your photographs.
description: Enhance your photography skills in our nature photography workshop. Capture stunning landscapes, wildlife, and more under the guidance of experienced photographers.
title: Nature Photography Workshop

code_of_conduct: Wear appropriate safety gear at all times while kayaking.
Listen carefully to instructions from guides and follow safety protocols.
Respect wildlife and do not disturb animals during the kayaking adventure.
Dispose of waste responsibly and keep the waterways clean.
Help fellow participants and demonstrate good sportsmanship throughout the experience.
description: Embark on a kayaking adventure along tranquil rivers and picturesque lakes. Explore hidden coves, spot wildlife, and enjoy the serenity of the water.
title: Kayaking Adventure

code_of_conduct: Stay on designated trails and respect trail markers.
Keep a safe distance from wildlife encountered during the trail run.
Stay hydrated and nourished throughout the challenge.
Help fellow participants and offer assistance if needed.
Notify event organizers or staff of any injuries or emergencies.
description: Test your endurance in our trail running challenge. Navigate rugged terrain, conquer steep inclines, and experience the thrill of trail running.
title: Trail Running Challenge

code_of_conduct: Stay on designated paths and respect garden boundaries.
Do not pick or disturb plants during the tour.
Listen attentively to the guide and ask questions respectfully.
Dispose of waste properly and keep the garden clean.
Respect the peace and tranquility of the garden for all visitors.
description: Explore the diverse flora of our local botanical garden in our guided tour. Discover rare plants, vibrant flowers, and tranquil garden landscapes.
title: Botanical Garden Tour

code_of_conduct: Respect the tranquility of the surroundings during the session.
Refrain from distracting others during yoga and meditation.
Be punctual and arrive on time for the session.
Follow the instructions of the yoga instructor for a safe and enriching experience.
Maintain a positive and respectful attitude towards fellow participants.
description: Start your day with a rejuvenating sunrise yoga session. Practice yoga poses amidst nature's beauty and welcome the new day with mindfulness and serenity.
title: Sunrise Yoga

code_of_conduct: Respect the natural environment and refrain from causing harm to plants or animals.
Be mindful of fellow participants' space and avoid disrupting others.
Dispose of waste responsibly and keep the area clean.
Listen attentively during sessions and participate respectfully.
Respect the privacy and confidentiality of others during sharing sessions.
description: Express your creativity and connect with nature in our nature journaling workshop. Capture the beauty of the outdoors through art, writing, and reflection.
title: Nature Journaling Workshop

code_of_conduct: Respect cooking equipment and follow safety guidelines.
Cooperate with fellow participants and share cooking responsibilities.
Dispose of waste properly and maintain cleanliness in the cooking area.
Listen attentively to instructions from the cooking instructor.
Enjoy the cooking experience and savor the outdoor feast together.
description: Learn the art of outdoor cooking in our hands-on class. Discover delicious recipes, cooking techniques, and enjoy a tasty feast in the great outdoors.
title: Outdoor Cooking Class

code_of_conduct: Respect the natural environment and avoid damaging flora or fauna.
Stay on designated trails and follow safety guidelines.
Work as a team and help others during the scavenger hunt.
Dispose of waste properly and leave no trace of the activity.
Celebrate the adventure with sportsmanship and camaraderie during the award ceremony.
description: Join us for a fun-filled nature scavenger hunt. Search for hidden treasures, solve clues, and embark on an exciting adventure through the wilderness.
title: Nature Scavenger Hunt
